name: Agent Bubble
description:
2D action-adventure platforming game that tests the ability of your game platforming to trace each level across more than 20 handmade levels.

Agent Bubble is available on Google Play Store !

Collect items floating by bubbles, defeat Monsters, challenge your platform skills, explore hidden caves, collect all diamonds, and look for mysterious legendary diamonds.
Agent Bubble is a Side-Scrolling Adventure game will make you enter the world of action adventure with graphics and music and captivating. The levels in the game are designed in high quality cartoon art style.

[How To Play]:
✔ Use the buttons to jump, run, dash, scouting and shooting.
✔ Defeat the enemy and collect diamonds to get money.
✔ Use money to unlock characters or improve abilities.

[Game Feature]:
✔ High resolution graphics.
✔ Responsive interface.
✔ Suitable for children and all ages.
✔ Free to play, don't have to pay.
✔ Different characters to choose.
✔ Various skills and abilities.
✔ Support for cellphones and tablets.
✔ Platforming and exploration.
✔ Play epic minigames.
✔ Platforming and exploration.
✔ Hidden treasure and legendary diamonds.

Stunning action platform game, let's challenge your platforming skills, explore hidden caves and collect all Diamonds !!.
